sentence.Network_en: The transverse diaphragm is very similar in appearance to the conventional bar joist.
sentence.Network_cn: 横梁很相似于通常的钢筋搁栅.

sentence.Network_en: A triangular metal bracket used to strengthen a joist.
sentence.Network_cn: 用于加固托梁的金属板.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English giste, from Old French, beam supporting a bridge', based on Latin jacere 'lie down'

entry.def: Joists are long thick pieces of metal, wood, or concrete that form part of the structure of a building, usually to support a floor or ceiling.

means.word_mean: 1. beam used to support floors or roofs
